name: Project Fireball
description:
In 2874, the Order of Xilkhuun has adopted a new law to prevent the death of good soldiers since the decline. Instead, criminals are given excessive sentences, then sent to clear obscure and perilous missions.

This is the first escape room online with role-playing features, we created this game for IGMC 2017, however; not only did we love developing it, we found it to be a lot of fun! The ideas kept flowing and the possibilities are endless, we really hope you enjoy it.

With only 30 days at hand for the contest, this'll come out as a prototype. You have access to the first part of a mission involving the chilling headquarters of the renown researcher, Colter Lyman. The mission requires 3 players! we made it easy for you to meet people in the lobby, create and join games.

The good news is, with your support, during the contest we will complete the entire mission with over an hour of exciting co-op play and upload it once we are allowed to edit our submissions, after the contest.

Keep in mind, currently rooms require 3 players and there is no way to reconnect to an existing game. To avoid from causing any re-connection issues we force close the game so you can come back, and join a new one safely. We worked very hard to create this game and there are elements that realistically require more time and resources.

This was one of our greatest challenges and an amazing experience, we'd do it again and again!

Game Tips

  • Communication and coordination is key to surviving the world of Xilkhuun.
  • Play with headphones for optimal immersion.
  • All nearby participants gain resolve from positive outcomes, the player solving a puzzle through direct action receives a bonus.
  • The in-game lobby is a great place to meet people and create teams, can't find anyone? We got you covered on our channel: https://discord.gg/SbbDvnf

Glossary

  • Health: If your health drops to 0 you die and re-spawn after 10 seconds, losing 1 resolve.
  • Stamina: increased chance to dodge traps and hazards, you lose 1 stamina at every save.
  • Resolve: Determines success rates during high stress situations and luck.

Controls

  • Movement: W, A, S, D / Arrow Keys / Left Click
  • Action/Confirm: Enter / Left Click
  • Cancel: Esc / Right Click
  • Open/Close Chat: F1
  • Join/Create Game: F6
  • Controller Supported*

Minimum Requirements

  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM.
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space.
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
